quest.name: A Taste of Home
journal: Lyngsath has received word that a foreign dignitary has arrived in Limsa Lominsa.
The time is come for you to employ your culinary skills for the benefit of Lominsan diplomacy. Speak with Latisha to learn what you are to prepare for the Admiral's esteemed guest.

You learn from Latisha that the dignitary is an emissary from Ishgard, and the Admiral wants her guest to enjoy a taste of home away from home. To this end, you have been tasked with preparing a traditional Ishgardian dish: Dzemael gratin. Suffice it to say, it must be of the finest quality.

You present your serving of Dzemael gratin to Latisha, who declares that it is certain to satisfy the Admiral's Ishgardian guest. Thanking you for your contribution, Latisha encourages you to strive ever higher as a culinarian.

※The next culinarian quest will be available from Lyngsath upon reaching level 50.
objectives: Deliver a serving of Dzemael gratin to Latisha.

dialogue.name: LYNGSATH
dialogue.text: I'm told ye passed Latisha's test with flyin' colors, an' now yer to cook fer the Admiral's official functions. Well, the time's come fer ye to begin flexin' 'em culinary muscles fer the good o' Lominsan diplomacy.

dialogue.name: LYNGSATH
dialogue.text: Aye, word arrived from the Bridge jus' now. A foreign dignitary's come to Limsa, an' the Admiral wants us─by which I mean you─to fashion the meal together.

dialogue.name: LYNGSATH
dialogue.text: Latisha's got all the details, so ye'll want to speak with 'er. Go an' do us proud, Forename!

dialogue.name: LATISHA
dialogue.text: I have been waiting for you, Forename. As I'm sure Lyngsath informed you, we are playing host to a man of some importance, an emissary from the Holy See of Ishgard. Your task is to prepare a dish that will satisfy him.

dialogue.name: LATISHA
dialogue.text: When the Admiral receives foreign visitors, she ordinarily requests that we serve them the best of Lominsan cuisine. This time, however, she wishes to treat her guest to a taste of home away from home─a gesture of goodwill.

dialogue.name: LATISHA
dialogue.text: To this end, you are to prepare a serving of Dzemael gratin. 'Tis a baked dish of eft tail and popotoes, creamy and warming, that is a mainstay in the cold climes of Ishgard. Suffice it to say that only the finest sample of the dish, made with only the finest ingredients, will do on this occasion.

dialogue.name: LATISHA
dialogue.text: Is the Dzemael gratin ready yet? Remember, only the finest sample of the dish will do for this occasion.

dialogue.name: LATISHA
dialogue.text: Ah, yes, it certainly looks and smells the part. Let us see if the same can be said of the taste.

dialogue.name: LATISHA
dialogue.text: Oh my... Simply exquisite! The crust is baked to golden perfection, and breaking it yields the creamy goodness beneath.

dialogue.name: LATISHA
dialogue.text: Eft tail tends to be lean and sinewy, but grinding it solves the problem. The Ishgardians have prepared the meat in this fashion since eras past, and I am pleased to see that you have done likewise.

dialogue.name: LATISHA
dialogue.text: As for the popoto slices, they are boiled enough to be cooked through, yet not so much as to render them bereft of texture. In summary, your Dzemael gratin leaves naught to be desired.

dialogue.name: LATISHA
dialogue.text: Lest you wonder, the dish takes its name from one of Ishgard's oldest and proudest families.

dialogue.name: LATISHA
dialogue.text: House Dzemael has long stood at the forefront of castle building. Legend has it the family created this dish in order to fill the bellies and warm the hearts of their workers, and I am confident that your rendition will do the same for our esteemed guest.

dialogue.name: LATISHA
dialogue.text: Today, your culinary creation shall serve not only to sate hunger, but also to close the distance between nations. You can hold your head up high, Forename. Keep up your efforts, and soon you will become the equal of Master Lyngsath himself.
